channel.title: Ok this is probly a really easy fix but nonethe less its not a stupid question
channel.description: :) OK so I'm wondering if somebody knows hot to add like a bank booth like foe EX. Ur in edge wild and wanna bank instead of having to leave the wild just bank there so it takes less time and EX like having a::skills command u got there and theirs like fishing spots and a range along with a RC alter so can someone please help???? please and thanks :) :) :D

item.title: Ok this is probly a really easy fix but nonethe less its not a stupid question
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

yea like he said you can do that or you could make a ::bank command available to every1 but there is a downside to that. (They can bank while pking) But you can just add makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, itemid, 0,-1,-2,-3(explained lower), 10);
keep the 10 the same; all this does is tell the server that its not a wall or something like that.
0,-1,-2, or -3 explained. This just simply tells what direction this faces, 0= west -1= north -2= east -3= south.
If you need any help just post here

Read full topic
item.source: Ok this is probly a really easy fix but nonethe less its not a stupid question

item.title: Ok this is probly a really easy fix but nonethe less its not a stupid question
item.dc:creator: @Pure_jukes Pure jukes
item.description:
@Pure_jukes wrote:

yea well first go to client.java and search makeglobalobject then copy one of the item lines like for example: makeGlobalObject(2510, 3863, 2783, -3, 10);// Anvil then press enter then paster it below then change the name: Anvil to Bank then change the i tem code: 2783 to watever the bank item coode is then change coords: 2510, first one is x second is y and the -3 or watever urs is is the way the bank is gonna be facing, or an easier way to do this is search the makeglobalobject then search bank and copy that then paster below and just change coords

Read full topic
